name: OFFKAT
description:
OFFKAT is the official Video Game Experience for the OFFWHITE / KATSU collaborative fashion project.

Virgil Abloh and KATSU race around OFFKAT City spraying graffiti on walls and buildings. They must complete graffiti missions and avoid police cars, police officers and CCTV. The more they paint the more they win the battle against the city and its corrupt new mayor.

Play OFFKAT in 2 different game modes:

-Free Roam allows players to explore the city and find artworks, collect coins and spray at their free will.

-Bomb Time is a race against the clock to get the highest score spraying targeted locations and avoiding the authorities. Player scores will appear on the OFFKAT Global Leaderboard.

Future updates will unveil new hidden items and gameplay.
Get ready to spray!
